description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Godspawn:
If all the creatures in your party belong to the {RACE_Godspawn} race, at the start of battle, your {RACE_Godspawn} creatures gain their respective {RACE_Avatar}'s trait.
name: Sigil of the Godspawn
